articles.author: Georgina Torbet
articles.title: How to watch Axiom-3 depart from the ISS on Monday - Digital Trends
articles.description: On Monday the Axiom-3 crew will depart the International Space Station (ISS), marking the end of the first all-European private mission to the station.
articles.content: On Monday, the Axiom-3 crew will depart from the International Space Station (ISS), marking the end of the first all-European private mission to the station. Launched on January 18, the four-person c… [+2101 chars]
